00020 #include "angle.h"
00021 #include "robotmodels.h"
00022 
00023 namespace RDK2 { namespace Geometry {
00024 
00025 bool diff(const Point2od& pose_old, const Point2od& pose_new, double &speed, double &jog) {
00026     jog   = angleDiff(pose_new.theta , pose_old.theta); // FIXME
00027 
00028     speed = sqrt( (pose_new.x - pose_old.x)*(pose_new.x - pose_old.x) +
00029                   (pose_new.y - pose_old.y)*(pose_new.y - pose_old.y) );
00030         
00031     int sign =
00032       sgn (  cos(pose_old.theta) * (pose_new.x - pose_old.x) +
00033              sin(pose_old.theta) * (pose_new.y - pose_old.y)  );
00034 
00035     speed *= sign;
00036     
00037     #define SMALL 1e-30
00038     /*if( (SMALL>abs(pose_old.x-pose_new.x))
00039      && (SMALL>abs(pose_old.x-pose_new.x)) )
00040       speed=0;*/
00041      if(fabs(speed)<SMALL) speed = 0;
00042      if(fabs(jog)<SMALL) jog = 0;
00043      
00044     return speed != 0 || jog != 0;
00045 }
00046 
00047     Point2od difference(Point2od p0, Point2od p1) {
00048         Point2d ds = (p1-p0).rot(-p0.theta);
00049         double dtheta = p1.theta - p0.theta;
00050         return Point2od(ds.x,ds.y,dtheta);
00051     }
00052     
00053     Point2od add(Point2od p0, Point2od diff) {
00054         Point2d p1 = (Point2d)p0 + diff.rot(p0.theta);
00055         return Point2od(p1.x,p1.y, p0.theta+diff.theta);    
00056     }
00057     
00058 }} // ns
